mapper.sql: LinkpointID, Name, Period, Postcondition, Precondition, CommunicationchannelID, channel, RequirementID
mapper.select: select portid,portname from getdistinctport where ComponentID=#{cmpid} group by portid,portname
mapper.insert: insert into linkpoint (LinkpointID, Name, Period, Postcondition, Precondition, CommunicationchannelID, channel, RequirementID) values (#{linkpointid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{period,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postcondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{precondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{communicationchannelid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{channel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{requirementid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into linkpoint
LinkpointID,
Name,
Period,
Postcondition,
Precondition,
CommunicationchannelID,
channel,
RequirementID,
#{linkpointid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{period,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{postcondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{precondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{communicationchannelid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{channel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{requirementid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update linkpoint
Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Period = #{period,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Postcondition = #{postcondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Precondition = #{precondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CommunicationchannelID = #{communicationchannelid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
channel = #{channel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RequirementID = #{requirementid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where LinkpointID = #{linkpointid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update linkpoint set Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Period = #{period,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Postcondition = #{postcondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Precondition = #{precondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CommunicationchannelID = #{communicationchannelid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, channel = #{channel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RequirementID = #{requirementid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where LinkpointID = #{linkpointid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
